author: Kendall Baker
title: UFC wants to host fight on tribal land to avoid coronavirus restrictions
description: In an attempt to skirt federal and state guidelines during the coronavirus pandemic, the UFC plans to hold its April 18 pay-per-view event on tribal land in California, per multiple reports. The state of play: Even as the rest of the sports world hits pause, …
content:
In an attempt to skirt federal and state guidelines during the coronavirus pandemic, the UFC plans to hold its April 18 pay-per-view event on tribal land in California, per multiple reports.
